data.title: Myrtle Beach Shows & Entertainment
data.meta_description: The Official Alabama Theatre Website of Myrtle Beach's Greatest Shows and Entertainment page. Book your tickets easily online for a spectacularly good time with us!
data.text:
Home of Live Music, Dancing, Comedy, and Entertainment

Don’t miss your opportunity to see the best live shows & entertainment in Myrtle Beach and North Myrtle Beach. The Alabama Theatre has been entertaining guests and locals of the Grand Strand for over 30 years. Don’t miss the our newest show ICONIC, or the highly acclaimed South’s Grandest Christmas Show.

And when our talented cast members take a night off, the Alabama Theatre is host to world famous Musicians, Singers and Comedians. Entertainment for the entire family.

Famous Guest Artists

Sprinkled throughout the year the theatre hosts guest artist concerts. From Comedian greats as Jay Leno, Leanne Morgan and James Gregory to Music Stars as The Beach Boys, the Oak Ridge Boys, Little River Band, Three Dog Night, Josh Turner, Lonestar, Jo Dee Messina, Lee Greenwood and Chris Janson. We also offer tribute bands with a wide variety of music like the Beatles, The Bee Gees, Frankie Valli, Neil Diamond and Alabama. The Myrtle Beach area is always welcoming these music legends, and you can only catch them at the Alabama Theatre.

The South’s Grandest Christmas Show

During the Holiday Season, the Alabama Theatre hosts Myrtle Beach’s most popular Christmas show. 3,000 miles south of the North Pole sits North Myrtle Beach’s home of The South’s Grandest Christmas Show. Enjoy the holiday season as you take part in a winter spectacular event filled with incredible scenery, dancing, comedy and classic holiday music. Bring your family and friends and celebrate the holidays the only way Alabama Theatre knows how to.
